casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Marion Preston GILLESPIE. No. 2P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 8, 2007. James R. Glover, Chapel Hill, for Gillespie. William D. Kenerly, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ____ N.C.App. ____, 638 S.E.2d 481.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of January 2007 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of January 2007."
